description: This header file defines minimal logging helper macros (LOGINFO, LOGWARN, LOGERR, LOGTRACE) for standalone or unit test builds within the AppGateway project. It provides lightweight logging facilities that output messages to standard error, suitable for testing environments where richer platform-specific logging is unavailable.

methods.name: LOGINFO
methods.description: Macro for logging informational messages to standard error.

methods.name: LOGWARN
methods.description: Macro for logging warning messages to standard error.

methods.name: LOGERR
methods.description: Macro for logging error messages to standard error.

methods.name: LOGTRACE
methods.description: Macro for logging trace/debug messages to standard error.
